chart_levels_settings.premiumMessage: Setting horizontal levels is available with premium access.
chart_levels_settings.candlesLength: Number of candles on the chart
chart_levels_settings.tooltipCandlesLength: Number of candles on the chart
chart_levels_settings.tooltipHorizontalLevelsPeriod: Period between candles to calculate extremes for horizontal levels
chart_levels_settings.tooltipHorizontalLevelsTouches: The initialization point (high/low) of the level does not count as a touch
chart_levels_settings.tooltipHorizontalLevelsTouchesThreshold: Perfect touches happen very rarely, so a small tolerance is recommended. The larger the timeframe, the larger the tolerance can be.
chart_levels_settings.tooltipHorizontalLevelsLivingTime: Lifetime of the level in hours
chart_levels_settings.premiumMessageColumns: Premium access is required to set up sorting columns.

tooltip.bigDensity: there is a high density at this level
tooltip.mediumDensity: there is a medium density at this level
tooltip.considerBreak: you may consider a breakout at this level
tooltip.entryPointMedium: Entry point for density breakdown or activity
tooltip.entryPointActivity: Entry point on activity or pending order before the first traded level
tooltip.entryPointGeneral: Entry point on activity or pending order before the first traded level

tooltip.minuteCandle: NATR for this period is calculated based on minute candles
tooltip.hourCandle: NATR for this period is calculated based on hourly candles

limit_order_tooltip.touches: Number of touches at the level

limit_order_resume.big_no_formation_old:
The density for this coin is large relative to the passing volume, not near the level, has been in the order book for a long time - you may consider:
- A rebound on the first approach;
- A breakout to capture momentum on multiple approaches (2 or more approaches to the density)
limit_order_resume.big_no_formation_recent:
The density for this coin is large relative to the passing volume, not near the level, recently in the order book - you may consider:
- A rebound on the first approach;
- A breakout to capture momentum on multiple approaches (2 or more approaches to the density)
limit_order_resume.big_formation_zero_touches_recent:
The density for this coin is large relative to the passing volume, at the level with 0 touches, recently in the order book - you may consider:
- A rebound after a reaction from the density;
- A breakout through the density
limit_order_resume.big_formation_zero_touches_old:
The density for this coin is large relative to the passing volume, at the level with 0 touches, has been in the order book for a long time - you may consider:
- A rebound after a reaction from the density;
- A breakout through the density
limit_order_resume.big_formation_many_touches_old:
The density for this coin is large relative to the passing volume, at the level with multiple touches, has been in the order book for a long time - you may consider:
- A breakout through the density
limit_order_resume.big_formation_many_touches_recent:
The density for this coin is large relative to the passing volume, at the level with multiple touches, recently in the order book - you may consider:
- A breakout through the density
limit_order_resume.medium_formation_zero_touches_recent:
The density for this coin is medium relative to the passing volume, at the level with 0 touches, recently in the order book - you may consider:
- A rebound after a reaction from the density
limit_order_resume.medium_formation_zero_touches_old:
The density for this coin is medium relative to the passing volume, at the level with 0 touches, has been in the order book for a long time - you may consider:
- A rebound after a reaction from the density;
- A breakout through the density
limit_order_resume.medium_formation_many_touches_old:
The density for this coin is medium relative to the passing volume, at the level with multiple touches, has been in the order book for a long time - you may consider:
- A breakout through the density
limit_order_resume.medium_no_formation:
The density for this coin is medium relative to the passing volume, not near the level - you may consider:
- A rebound after a reaction or on a sharp approach
limit_order_resume.small: The density for this coin is small relative to the passing volumes

candlesLength: Number of candles on the chart
candlesLengthTooltip: Number of candles on the chart
horizontalLevelsPeriodTooltip: Period between candles to calculate extremes for horizontal levels
horizontalLevelsTouchesTooltip: The initialization point (high/low) of the level does not count as a touch

navigation_settings.premium_filter_message: Filtering settings for coins are available with premium access

volumeSplash.tooltipPostfix: For example, a value of 2 may indicate a twofold increase in volume over the selected period.
volumeSplash.period5m: The 5-minute period shows how the trading volume over the last 5 minutes compares to the average volume over the last 2 hours.
volumeSplash.period10m: The 10-minute period shows how the trading volume over the last 10 minutes compares to the average volume over the last 2 hours.
volumeSplash.period15m: The 15-minute period shows how the trading volume over the last 15 minutes compares to the average volume over the last 2 hours.
volumeSplash.period20m: The 20-minute period shows how the trading volume over the last 20 minutes compares to the average volume over the last 2 hours.
volumeSplash.period30m: The 30-minute period shows how the trading volume over the last 30 minutes compares to the average volume over the last 2 hours.
volumeSplash.period1h: The 1-hour period shows how the trading volume over the last 1 hour compares to the average volume over the last 2 hours.
volumeSplash.period2h: The 2-hour period shows how the trading volume over the last 2 hours compares to the average volume over the last 24 hours.
volumeSplash.period6h: The 6-hour period shows how the trading volume over the last 6 hours compares to the average volume over the last 24 hours.
volumeSplash.period12h: The 12-hour period shows how the trading volume over the last 12 hours compares to the average volume over the last 24 hours.
volumeSplash.period24h: The 24-hour period shows how the trading volume over the last 24 hours compares to the average volume over the last 7 days.

bitget.promotion: Now you can get premium access to our screener completely free! Simply trade on the Bitget exchange:
bitget.reward: For every trade, you receive a 20% refund of the commission amount to your Bitget account.
bitget.premium: Accumulate 60 USDT in commission, and we will give you premium access to the screener for 30 days.
bitget.balance: Your commission balance is calculated for the last 30 days. To get premium access, your trading volume over the last 30 days must accumulate a commission of at least 60 USDT.
bitget.exampleDescription: If you've traded on Bitget with a commission of 60 USDT, you can click 'Activate' in your personal account to get premium access for 30 days. If you've accumulated 120 USDT or more in the last 30 days, you can extend your premium access for another 30 days by clicking 'Extend access'.
bitget.bitget_terms_title: Terms and conditions for getting free premium with BITGET

guard.title: DIGASH.LIVE
guard.description: Unique DIGASH author screener by trader DIGAHKA designed for real-time ALL-IN formations - telegram notifications, sorting, densities, horizontal levels, inclined levels, filters, and much more.

technical_indicators.coinDataDescription: Volume, volatility, correlation, price change over a selected time range (from 5 minutes to 24 hours)
technical_indicators.openInterestDescription: Open Interest is the total number of outstanding derivative contracts
technical_indicators.rsiDescription: RSI determines the strength of a trend and the likelihood of its reversal
technical_indicators.atrDescription: ATR measures volatility, accounting for any gaps in price movement
technical_indicators.RSIDescription: RSI determines the strength of a trend and the likelihood of its reversal
technical_indicators.OIDescription: Open Interest is the total number of outstanding derivative contracts
technical_indicators.CoinDataDescription: Volume, volatility, correlation, price change over the selected time period (from 5 minutes to 24 hours)
technical_indicators.ATRDescription: ATR measures volatility by considering any gaps in price movement
technical_indicators.userTradesDescription: Your trade history will be displayed on the chart. Trades are loaded onto the chart when you click the 'Wallet' icon in the top right or press SHIFT + T. Add an API key in your profile.
technical_indicators.UserTradesDescription: Your trade history will be displayed on the chart. Trades are loaded onto the chart when you click the 'Wallet' icon in the top right or press SHIFT + T. Add an API key in your profile.
technical_indicators.NotificationsStoryDescription: Displays the location where notifications were triggered on the chart

vataga.terms_title: Conditions to get premium access through Vataga Crypto
vataga.bindingDescription: Create an account on Vataga Crypto using our referral
vataga.binanceRefundDescription: For each trade, you get a 25% refund of the fee amount to your Vataga Crypto account.
vataga.bybitRefundDescription: For each trade, you get up to 37.5% bonuses of the fee amount to your Vataga Crypto account.
vataga.minCommissionDescription: You need to accumulate a minimum commission within a month:
vataga.activateAccessDescription: Once all conditions are met, activate premium access for 30 days by clicking 'Activate'.
vataga.extendAccessDescription: Accumulate $120/$360 or more in fees over the last 30 days to extend premium access for another 30 days through your profile page.
vataga.exampleDescription: If you trade on Vataga Crypto generating fees of $120 on Binance or $360 on Bybit, you can click 'Activate' in your profile to get premium access for 30 days. If in the last 30 days you accumulated $240 or more on Binance or $720 or more on Bybit, you can extend premium access for another 30 days by clicking 'Extend Access' in your profile.
vataga.promoTitle: Trade on Vataga Crypto and get Premium for FREE
vataga.promoDescription: Trade on Binance and Bybit through a single personal account in a free terminal for Windows and MacOS with a fee discount of up to 37.5%.
